name: Cyber Turtle
description:
Cyber Turtle is a 3RD person survival game where you play as the cyber turtle fighting against computer "bugs", collect different power-ups and fight different kinds of bugs to survive, easy to pick up but different to master

the game was made using Godot game engine 3.1.2 for WOWIE game jam 2.0 with the topic of: Intentional bugs, I find the game suitable for the topic as you are fighting against computer "bugs", also there's a random chance that you deal double damage while tackling enemies, honestly this is a bug itself but it was satisfying to use and it fits the topic so i kept it :D

controls:

WASD to move

LEFT CLICK to attack (also counters projectiles)

RIGHT CLICK to reflect projectiles

SHIFT to dodge

SPACE to jump

also sorry for downloadable files, itch.io is a pain when uploading .pck files

Youtube channel: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCvHyRF4fwSuQYy6_sHKwlBg?view_as=subscriber
